category.title: Welcome to Access My Info!
category.callout: What do companies and government know about you? What do they keep on file? Who do they share it with? Organizations are required by Canadian privacy laws to disclose this information to their customers upon request. We can help with that.
category.label: Category
category.requestsProcessed: Join the 231 other people who have created a request on this system.
category.instruction2: You may make multiple requests with our website (but one at a time!).
category.instruction3: It only takes 5 easy steps. Start by choosing a category below.
category.info-1: Access My Info (AMI) is a web application that enables you to find out what a variety of different companies and government departments know about you. It guides you via a step-by-step wizard to generate a formal letter that requests access to your personal information. This letter can then be sent via postal mail or email to the respective company’s privacy officer, or attached to the federal government's Access to Information request tool.
category.sponsorStatement: Access My Info is a joint initiative created by members of
category.translateStatement: Access My Info was translated by
category.socialMediaMessage: Spread the word about our project:

operator.title: Select your service provider
operator.callout: Begin your request by selecting a company that provides you a service.
operator.label: Companies

customCompany.heading: Add custom company
customCompany.name: Company Name
customCompany.intro: Please provide the contact information for the person responsible for interacting with the public regarding customer privacy. Usually this information can be found on the company's privacy policy.
customCompany.instructions: Provide either a full mailing address or an email address.

questions.title: What data do you want to access?
questions.callout: Make enquiries about how your data is collected, used, shared and stored.
questions.label-data-note: This list is meant to be exhaustive. {{operator}} may not retain some of these items.
questions.bank-desc: Federal government departments store personal data in “data banks”. Specifying specific data banks for {{operator}} to look through to find your personal data will improve the chances of a successful request. We have identified some data banks of interest, but please check the full list here and add any you see fit.
questions.otherBank: To add another data bank to your request, please consult the full list of {{operator}} data banks here.
questions.addDataBank: Add another data bank to your request

subject.title: Identifying information
subject.callout: Enter your information so {{company}} can identify you in their records.
subject.callout-not-store: Access My Info will not collect or store any of the personal information below.
subject.label: Your Personal Information

request.title: Your request is ready
request.callout: Your letter to {{operator}} has been successfully generated by our system. Remember, access should be free or at minimal cost
request.callout-gov: Your letter to {{operator}} has been successfully generated by our system.

instructions.choice-intro: How would you like to send your letter?
instructions.gov-intro: Attach this letter to the official government form
instructions.postalonly-intro: This company currently only accepts requests by postal mail.
instructions.emailonly-intro: This company currently only accepts requests by email.
instructions.read-careful: Read over the letter carefully, then follow the instructions below.
instructions.post-instructions: Use the button below to create a PDF of your letter. Then print it and mail it to:
instructions.email-instructions: Use the button below to email your letter to:
instructions.email-unavailable: Option 1 Unavailable: No email listed for company privacy officer.
instructions.email-empty-prompt: If the email is empty or the button didn't work...
instructions.email-empty-instructions: Click here to copy the text of the email to your clipboard
instructions.gov-instructions: Use the button below to create a PDF of your letter. Then upload it in the "Attach Documents" stage when filling out the official government form here:
instructions.gov-extra: Remember to choose Privacy Act request in the government form.

request.emailProblem: Problem? Simply copy & paste the below text into your email client and send to {{email}}
request.thanks: That's it! Thank you for participating in the Access My Info project.
request.continue: Continue on to maximize your impact
request.ami-again-prompt: Still curious? You can submit multiple requests within Access My Info:

finish.title: Thank you for submitting your request!
finish.share-text: Do you know you have the right to access your own personal info? Find out what companies know about you at {{shareURL}}
finish.share-prompt: Share this campaign with your friends:
finish.label-data: Access My Info may collect basic information about from whom I requested data for statistical purposes.
finish.label-subscribe: Access My Info may use my email address in order to provide me with reminders, tips, and invitations to help further research regarding my request.
finish.language-switch-legend: Vous pourriez obtenir de meilleurs résultats avec les entreprises situées à l'étranger et n'offrant pas de services en français en leur faisant parvenir votre demande en anglais.
finish.text-data: Share the following data with Access My Info: Request made to {{operator}} for the {{servicelist}} in {{jurisdiction}} on {{date}}.
finish.text-subscribe: I agree that Access My Info may send me emails regularly to remind me of the progress of my data access request. I, therefore, authorise Access My Info to store my email address in a server located in Canada.  Access My Info may send me an email alert or instructions to deal with situations where {{operator}} fails to give a reply after a specified period of time. Should I receive a reply, I agree that Access My Info may send me an email invitation to complete a short survey. I understand that Access My Info will not disclose my email address to any third parties, other than the email service which sends the emails to me.

wrapper.privacy:
This service does not collect any of the personal information you provide. This information is used only to generate a letter, which is done entirely in your web browser. Other web pages linked to from this service will be governed by different policies. When you load the service, the web server that hosts the service logs a record of that event. These logs include the IP address used to access each resource required for the service, the date & time of access, and several other non-identifying metadata fields.

In the event you provides us your email address to contact you, we will only use it for the specific purposes agreed by you. We will not use, disclose, transfer your email address to any third parties beyond the purposes of administering the Access My Info service.
wrapper.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is a research and educational tool and is meant for informational purposes only. This service does not provide legal advice. You are solely responsible for your use of this service and any resulting consequences. Open Effect and partners make no claims, promises, or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the information contained in this document. This software is offered as-is, with no warranty. Nothing herein should be used as a substitute for the legal advice of competent counsel.
wrapper.license: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
